name: Desert Run VR - Run, Exercise and Stay Fit in VR with your Oculus Quest 1 & 2!
name_original: Desert Run VR - Run, Exercise and Stay Fit in VR with your Oculus Quest 1 & 2!
description:
Are you ready to challenge the Desert? Run, exercise and stay fit in VR!

Watch on the video below to see the Desert Run VR Gameplay in action !!!

-----------------------------------------------------------

Are you ready to challenge the Desert? Do you want to run, exercise or simply stay fit with with your Oculus Quest? Now You can! We have released Desert Run VR, the first and most realistic simulation for jogging, exercise and stay fit in a realistic and immersive virtual 3d environment! 

The App is totally compatible with your Oculus Quest VR headset (1 & 2) and very soon it will also be compatible with all the other VR viewers and the smartphones on the market.

The virtual environment reproduces the Arizona desert environment faithfully. You will have the feeling of running in a real desert scenario with trees, cacti, tumbleweeds, snakes, lizards, coyotes and other wild animals, at day and at night, with a totally immersive, realistic and absolutely thrilling experience. 

You will be able to  train day or night as you please, just like in reality!

We have worked very hard to offer you the most innovative and realistic training and running simulation ever made. You will be able to exercise in an effective and fun way from the comfort of your home whenever you want.

Do you want to stay fit jogging,running  or walking  in the comfort of your home? Do you want to do physical activity when and how do you want? Do you want to play sports without going to crowded places or risking unnecessarily at the health level? 

With our Virtual App you can comfortably  stay fit  in a safe, fun and engaging way at home  at work or anywhere else you want at anytime of the day and  whenever you want!  

Thanks to the AI each workout will be different from the previous one and you will be able to train in a setting that is always new and engaging. The AI recognise also the time (e.g. if you train in the evening it will also be in the app). 

You will be able to run or walk in a totally immersive virtual environment also monitoring your progress in real time (steps taken, distance travelled) You will able  to  train  in a  effective and fun way  with a pleasant and motivating background music  in an absolutely realistic virtual environment with your VR headset (Oculus Quest 1 & Oculus Quest 2).  

Features:

 ■ You can run at home

Limited time? Bad weather? No problem! With our App You can run confortably at home.

■ Stunning experience

The first and most realistic simulation for jogging in a  wild, thrilling and immersive 3d environment. 

■ A magic experience

A fantastic experience that will totally captivate you (both at day and at night). 

■ Stay fit with music

Train with an energetic and motivating soundtrack that changes everytime.

 ■ Each traning is unique

Each training session will be fun, engaging and different from the last thanks to the AI. 

■ Track your progress

You can monitor your progress in real time every time (steps taken, distance travelled)..

■ No need of costly gear

Forget expensive gym membership or costly equipments, you need only the Oculus viewer  that you already have.

■ A real training in VR

Each training session wil be absolutely effective, you will burn almost 636 calories with an hour training session.

■ Too out of shape to run?

You can simply just walk and loosing weight while having fun.
